text: A Giant crab is a type of crustacean. Giant crab may refer to: *Japanese spider crab (Macrocheira kaempferi), the largest crab species alive *Tasmanian giant crab (Pseudocarcinus gigas), another large crab species == See also == * Giant Enemy Crab, a 2006 Internet meme * A Giant Crab Comes Forth debut album by Giant Crab (band) Category:Animal common name disambiguation pages
title: Giant crab
